setRunFirstMenuOption

public void setRunFirstMenuOption(boolean enable)
Set the behavior of the main button.

Parameters:
enable - if true, a click on the main button will trigger an actionPerformed() on the first item in the popup menu.

getRunFirstMenuOption

public boolean getRunFirstMenuOption()
Returns:
true if a click on the main button will trigger an actionPerformed() on the first item in the popup menu.
